body.name: PRICUSIS Nonstick Ceramic Sauté Pan with Lid (4.8 qt, 12 inch), Toxin-Free Deep Frying Pan, Versatile Non Stick Frying Pan, Skillet, PTFE, PFOA & PFAS Free, Compatible with All Stovetops.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 54 mins
features: DURABLE CONSTRUCTIONS: Cast aluminum nonstick sauté pan provides durability, fast and even heating, never warp. The bakelite handle stays comfortable and cool when used on the stove. The lid of 12 inch saute pan is suitable for PRICUSIS same size Frying Pan 12 inch: B0BRTT29LK.
NON-TOXIC COATING: Our ceramic sauté pan with lid is free of PTFE, PFOA, PFAS, lead, cadmium and other toxic materials, which gives for healthy cooking in the kitchen.

CERAMIC NON-STICK: The super nonstick ceramic coating makes food easily slides around the cooking surface with a minimal amount of oil or butter. The efforless release and clean up bring you a enjoyable cooking experience.
STOVETOP AGNOSTIC: The thick stainless base is protected your food from burning, it is suitable for all stoves (Gas, Electric, Ceramic & Induction). Oven safe to 356℉.

VERSATILE FRY PAN: This nonstick deep frying pan with high sides and wide bottow can hold larger volumes of foods, it is perfect for deep frying, braising, searing, steaming, sautéing, boiling, truly meets all your culinary needs.
GIFT READY: Comes with elegant gift boxes which is a perfect gift for your familys and friends. (Such as Mother's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Non-sticky Ceramic Cookware for Healthy Food and Easy Cleaning

Kitchen Essentials Made for Everyday Cooking Sauté pan is one of the most versatile pans in kitchen, it can meet various cooking needs. In order to taste more delicious and healthy food, PRICUSIS is committed to provide nonstick ceramic cookware, making cook and clean up easily, the most important is that the naturally smooth ceramic coating is safe, free of PFOA, PTFE, PFAS, impossible to pronounce chemical into your food and the air.

Previous page Deep Frying Pan Wider cook surface & taller sides are deep enough to make large one-pan meals and prevent splashing. Double Spouts The both sides spouts are convenient to pour out liquid. Glass Lid The glass lid and silicone edge help retain heat and moisture for more even and faster cooking. Next page 1 Big Capacity 2 No Mess 3 Fast Cooking

Previous page We Care For Your Health Our Non-toxic ceramic cookware is free of PFOA, PTFE, PFAs, lead, cadmium, and other toxic materials Ceramic Nonstick Saute Pan The super nonstick release that helps food slide right off with less oil or butter. Interior & Exterior Nonstick The interior and exterior nonstick design makes cleaning up is a breeze. Next page 1 Non-Toxic 2 Easy To Cook 3 Easy To Clean
Cook For The People You Love The simplest things in life give us the most pleasure. Cook a good meal with a little creativity, a sprinkle of love, enjoying your familly and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Nonstick Saute Pan
reviews.reviewText: The pan exceeded my expectation in every way. It is sleek in design and the performance is exceptional. Its not very heavy to carry as well. The Non stick coating is really great making cooking and cleaning an absolute breeze. This helps to save a lot of time and also ensures the meals are healthier with minimal oil.The Lid is a thoughtful touch which help to reduce the splatter . It also help to lock in the moisture so the food is cooked perfectly. The transparent help to monitor the food and is a great convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pan I've ever had!
reviews.reviewText: Now that we ate empty nester, I make smaller meals for just the two of us. This pan is perfect and with the higher sides, I can make many more dishes than I could in my conventional 10 inch pan! I even made a shepherd's pie in it! And with the pour spouts on each side, there is no boil-over!And clean up is a breeze!! Nothing sticks! An easy wipe with a little dish soap and some water, a quick rinse and you're good to go!Highly recommend!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pan is wonderful, it has replaced all of the other plans we typically use in the kitchen. It works perfectly and is the best kind of nonstick. I personally also love the handle, it’s big and study and has the best sort of soft touch. This pan is great, I would certainly consider adding more of these to our pan lineup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan. Cooks everything from eggs to stroganoff beautifully using an induction portable stove top. Clean up requires just sponge. Stores well. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice deep pan to add to your kitchen arsenal
reviews.reviewText: I like the materials used for the pan, like the flat glass lid as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Let me just say, I LOVE THIS PAN!!!!! It cleans up so easily, very non-stick!!!! I bought it because it has a pour spout on each side, non-stick, comes with a lid, a handle, to some degree, on each side and is light weight. It absolutely checks all of those boxes. I highly recommend this pan!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars no more non-stick after only two weeks
reviews.reviewText: This pan looked nice and was easy to use when it was out of the box. In the first week, it worked as it advertised: it cooks egg and salmon like a charm. However, in the second week, the pan starts losing the non-stickness and creating a mess no mater what i cook. I never overheated it (less than 4 out of 9 on my stove scale) and only wash it by hand with soft sponge. The durability and performance of this product is disappointing. Not recommended it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this product
reviews.reviewText: My very favorite new fry pan! Easy to clean, stylish, non-stick and the perfect size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Size is right for us, not that big and noy that small.
reviews.reviewText: We just try yesterday, it worked out very good as what we expested.
